title: Discover a hidden treasure in Alhambra! Peaceful 2 bed, 2 bath
posting_body: ➢ Easy Access to San Bernardino Freway CA-10
Enjoying the city life has never been more perfectly paired than at Almansor Villa.
We are conveniently located with easy access to the 10, 710 and 110 freeways, and just a 20-minute drive to LAX, Burbank and Long Beach airports.
Located 10 minutes from downtown Los Angeles and Pasadena, Almansor Villa is the place to be.
We are also in close proximity to Alhambra's landmarks and business district, surrounded by several lush parks and the historic Huntington Library & Botanical Gardens.
Just outside our front doors is local shopping, dining and entertainment.
Come see how our large, beautiful, and open townhome style 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments can fit your lifestyle.
Our beautiful open concept living has spacious kitchens, stainless steel appliances, upgraded flooring and large mirrored closets.
We are a gated access community with both vehicle and pedestrian gates.
Can you see yourself cooling off in our newly remodeled gorgeous pool or just using our state of the art grill to cook a beautiful dinner?
With an onsite card operated laundry, beautiful lounge area to rest after a long day, or our park like setting, Almansor Villa has something to offer everyone.
Come and see why Almansor Villa is the place to live in Alhambra!
Breed Restriction;Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, Rent $50.00 for animals under 40lbs and $100.00 for over 40lbs, Deposit $500.00.
Other animals are subject to management approval.
